about_the_game:
One day all the world’s leaders mysteriously vanished, leaving behind an era of peace—that is until humanity got bored. Now, a new set of "unfortunate" leaders must step up to bring back normalcy. Unfortunate Leaders pits up to four players against each other, where moves are queued and executed in sequence, leading to fun and unpredictable gameplay. It's easy to pick up and great for both casual and strategic players.

Features

  • Online Multiplayer: Play with up to 3 friends in custom lobbies on unique maps, or jump into matchmaking for fast, strategic competition.

  • Custom Maps: Create your own maps for unique and replayable scenarios.

  • Unique Characters with Special Abilities: Choose from a roster of interesting leaders, each with their own set of special abilities and strategies to master.

  • Accessibly Deep Gameplay: Whether you're a casual player or a seasoned strategist, Unfortunate Leaders is easy to learn but offers enough depth to keep you engaged match after match.

name: Unfortunate Leaders
short_description: Conquer the world! In this turn-based strategy game, play as one of the many unfortunate leaders with unique abilities. Build your resources and queue your moves effectively. Play with friends or test yourself online, and discover what kind of leader you will become!
